properties.address: Banham Community Centre, Banham, Norfolk NR16 2HB
properties.description: The space is open to all throughout the year as a community cafe but functions as a warm space during all year and we extend our opening time to 12:30pm when the clocks go back and serve warming soup and a roll. It is a vibrant and welcoming space open to all ages. Our free cafe is open every Wednesday throughout the year. We are also open on Tuesdays between 12:00 and 13:00 for our Movement for Wellbeing sessions.
properties.title: Banham Village Hub

properties.address: Harling Old School Hal, EAST HARLING, United Kingdom NR16 2LU 2LU
properties.description: Weekly hub in the centrally located, spacious and warm Old School Hall, the village hub
properties.title: East Harling Welcome Hub

properties.description: A free children's clothes bank open Tues and Fri mornings. Free comfortable warm space to stay and play with free warm refreshments.
properties.title: Growkids Clothes Bank

properties.description: A weekly mindfulness cafe offering free hot drinks, good food and a range of mindfulness activities from cooking to crafts. Tuesdays 10am -12pm Come join us! All very welcome.
properties.title: Mindfulness Cafe

properties.address: The Salvation Army, Thetford, Norfolk IP24 2BN IP24 2BN
properties.description: We cater for all ages . Enjoy time to chat, play board games or be creative with a wide selection of crafts. We also provide a listening ear and practical support from making phone calls filling in forms or learning to use a lap top.

hours._text: Tuesday: 09:30 - 12:00, Wednesday: 10:00 - 02:30 Fortnightly, Thursday: 09:30 - 12:00, Friday: 09:30 - 12:00, Saturday: 09:30 - 12:00

properties.description: Come and join us each week for some friendly company and chat. All are welcome for free tea coffee and chocolate biscuits. We are also a warm space for all who need it. There is opportunity to charge electronic devices and desks are available for those who wish to work in a warm environment. Call Ruth for more information on 07783 126 897
properties.title: Hopton Community Cafe

properties.address: St Bartholomew's Church, The Street, Ingham, Bury St Edmunds IP31 1NQ, UK
properties.description: Cup and Chatter – an informal get together over coffee and cake. Meet neighbours from across the villages Slow Stitching – Material collage for all ages and abilities – materials provided Art group – Art based activities for everyone from beginners to experienced artists. Materials provided or bring your own work. We are a dog friendly venue.

hours._text: Cup and Chatter: Every Thursday 10.00 – 12.00 & Art Group: – Every other Thursday 14.00 – 16.00 Slow Stitching – Every other Monday 1.30pm – 3.30pm
